headline: Republic Airways and Mesa Air Group Complete Merger
summary: CARMEL, Ind. & PHOENIX, November 25, 2025--Republic Airways Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ: RJET) today announced the successful completion of the merger between Republic Airways and Mesa Air Group, Inc. The transaction was announced on April 7, 2025 and approved by Mesa stockholders on November 17, 2025. Under the terms of the merger agreement, Republic stockholders now own approximately 88% of the combined company’s common stock and Mesa stockholders will own at least 6%, and up to 12% of the combined

headline: DAL's Largest Transatlantic Schedule in 2026: Growth Story Hotting up?
summary: Delta plans its largest transatlantic schedule for summer 2026, adding new routes and upgraded amenities to tap rebounding travel demand.

headline: Internova Travel Group Named to Forbes' List of Most Trusted Companies in America
summary: Internova Travel Group has been named to Forbes' Most Trusted Companies in America 2026, the only travel services company to earn this distinction. The recognition follows an extensive review of more than 1,500 public and private companies to identify those that excel in trust among employees, customers, investors and the media.

headline: Delta Air Lines (DAL): Exploring Valuation After This Week’s 9% Share Price Surge
summary: Delta Air Lines (DAL) shares are in focus as investors continue to digest the company’s recent performance. Over the past week, the stock has climbed nearly 9%, while its year-to-date return remains positive. See our latest analysis for Delta Air Lines. The recent surge in Delta Air Lines’ share price hints at renewed optimism, possibly reflecting a shift in investor sentiment after a stretch of mixed returns. While the stock has built momentum this week, long-term total shareholder returns...
